flawed_nl_solution:
If Phil had won 3 games more than did Charlie, and Phil won 12 games, then Charlie won 12-3=<<12-3=11>>11 games.
If Charlie had won 2 games fewer than Dana, and Charlie won 11 games, then Dana won 11+2=<<11+2=13>>13 games.
If Perry had won 5 more games than did Dana, and Dana won 13 games, then Perry won 13+5=<<13+5=18>>18 games.
Thus, Perry won 18-12=<<18-12=6>>6 more games than did Phil.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
